Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring all NYPD officers to receive sensitivity training to assist them in responding to victims of harassment and sexual assault.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring all NYPD officers to receive sensitivity training to assist them in responding to victims of harassment and sexual assault.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a case management system for cases investigated by the special victims division of the New York city police department
